SQL Server Data Access Components
Copyright 1997-2007, Core Lab. All Rights Reserved
--------------------------------------------------

Demo for QuickReport included in SDAC was built and tested using 
Borland QuickReport Components in Delphi 5.

Lets you launch and view a QuickReport application based on SDAC.
This demo project lets you modify the application in design-time.

IMPORTANT NOTE:
  Demo provided as is and there are no warranty that it is fully
  compatible with other versions of QuickReport.
